## ğŸ”’ Security Issue Reporting

If you've opened this issue by mistake, please:

1. **Close this issue immediately**
2. **Email the details to sathyendrav@gmail.com**
3. Include "SECURITY VULNERABILITY" in the subject line

## ğŸ“§ What to Include in Your Email

- Type of vulnerability
- Affected files or components

- Proof of concept (if available)
- Suggested fix (if you have one)

## ğŸ¤ Responsible Disclosure

We follow responsible disclosure practices:

- You will receive a response within **48 hours**
- We will keep you informed of our progress
- We will credit you in the security advisory (unless you prefer anonymity)
- We aim to fix critical issues within **30 days**
